pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, September 17, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of France, Emmanuel Macron.

The Prime Minister will visit the Ottawa Kosher Food Bank to help pack food items with volunteers for delivery on the occasion of Rosh Hashana.

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will speak with the Leader of the Bloc Québécois, Yves-François Blanchet.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will speak with the Parliamentary Caucus Leader of the Green Party, Elizabeth May.

Closed to media.
